alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:01PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Madison, northeastern Limestone, Moore and Lincoln Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 101 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lewisburg to 9 miles east of Pulaski to 15 miles west of Ardmore. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Ardmore, Petersburg, Lester, Elkwood, Howell, Mimosa, Holland Gin and Leggtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
